1.content: What kind of story are we going for here? Go wild!
1.title: Let's Begin

11.content:
Let's say that our father character, Richard is around 40 years old. He is the one who will discover the shrink ray and use it on his daughter to spend some... quality time with her.

How old is Richard's daughter?
11.title: Dad shrinks daughter

choices: Time for some fun with her.
Something is wrong, she is still very slowly shrinking.
111.content:
Richard was a man in his 40's and it has been a few month since his wife died. Since then he was
the only legal gurdian his 9 year old daughter Sarah had. Even as his wife was still alive he always had...
fantasies involving his daughter and now after so much time he could really make his fantasy a reality.

The money he inherited was more then enough to not work anymore and also to fuel his biggest invention.
After month of working he was finally ready to test his protable shrink ray.
He was just completing his last test run and activated the device. With a buzzing sound the HD screen on the ray gun
activated and showed everything from the perspective of the tip, just like he planned it.

At first he made sure the mode was set to object and a target system quicky showed him the chair he wanted to lock on to.
With a beep his target turned green on the screen. He adjusted the size and intensity on the dials to a very low setting and fired at
the chair in front of him. Very slowly the chair dwindled to 3/4th of its original size, then he directly restored it just as slow, the whole
process took several minutes on this low setting. He then adjusted both to maximum and fired again.

In an instant the chair shrunk out of sight. As he kneeled down he saw an incredible tiny chair, not even an inch tall.
He tried to pick it up but it just broke in his fingers. "Ok looks like everything is in order." He smiled. "Time for a real test."
He continued. Finally Sarah would become his tiny plaything, nothing could stop him now.

He changed the settings again as he began to walk into the direction of his daughters room, he made sure to put the intensity to 10%
and adjusted the size so she would end up around 2 inches tall.

Slowly he opened the door and put the mode of the gun to human. He entered the room and spotted his daughter on the floor playing with
one of her Barbie dolls on the floor. She was wearing a bright yellow dress and short ankle socks, she was still oblivious that her
father just entered her room. He points the ray gun at the little girl and fires. That she doesn't even notice she was hit probably means
the raygun inflicts no pain, Richard thought to himself. Only moments later he could see that his invention works as intended.

He can see that the socks on her feet seem to grow on her, now she also seem to realize that something is wrong.
"I feel weird, my body is all tingly." She says out loud as she drops the doll on the fuzzy carpet benath her.
As she stands up you notice her dress slowly geeting closer to the ground and sleeve of her dress slowly sliding of her shoulder,
only stopped by her arm. At least for now.

"Everything is getting bigger, what is happening." She says and interpreting her situation completely wrong. Her socks already
look really baggy on her slowly shrinking feet. You hear a shriek as her panties suddenly drop to the ground.
"My clothes, nothing is growing I'm shrinking." She squaks. To you her voice already sounds so cute as she gets smaller and smaller.
As she turns around she is instantly startled as she sees her dad standing in the doorframe.

"Please daddy, help me. I'm shrinking." But you can't understand what she says, the blood is rushing through your
brain is overwhelming. Suddenly her dress falls down, followed by an even higher pitched squeal, she's not even 2 foot tall now.
She grabs her oversized dress to hide her nude chest, but the shrinking now seems to speed up and quickly she is
overwhelmed by her growing dress, now she was only a little lump quickly getting smaller.

He just had come as the shrinking stopped, but it was no use, his member was already hard again as he got on all fours
to search the clothes for his now tiny daughter. He picks up the dress from the floor and puts it to the side.
Before him, inside her own panties, he found his precious tiny toy girl. She kneels naked as the day she was born
and looks up terrified at you. "Daddy I'm down here, please don't squish me." She pleas in a tiny cute voice.
"Of course I'm not gonna squish you sweetie, here let me pick you up."
With his right hand he scoops the thumb sized girl up, letting out another surprised squeak.

"How did I get so small?" She asks, her voice seemed a bit calmer now. "Well I shrunk you with this."
He points at the shrink ray he had put on the floor. "Why did you shrunk me?" She asks in disbelive.
"I always wanted to have a tiny plaything and now that I have a shrink ray, I made my favorite little girl my personal plaything."
Richard raises the hand more to get a better view of his new toy, she looks so pretty and feels so great squirming in your hand.
She was to shocked to say something and that her giant father was standing up didn't help either.

Just after a few steps he cups his hand, so his little daughter slides down his hand, landing on her
own giant desk. He puts down a massive ruler behind her. "Come stand up I want to measure you."
Silent she complies, just like you though. A little under 2 inches tall and like imagined an really great
front view. .
111.title: Richard the genius pervert

12.content: How old is the son who shrinks his mom?
12.title: Son shrinks mother

121.content:
“Mommy, can you come play with me?” asked 9 year-old Timmy to his mom.

“Not now, sweetie. Mommy’s not feeling good,” Evelyn replied as she held her head in her hand, carrying a half-drunken bottle of alcohol in her other hand. Timmy wished she could stop drinking the bad stuff and come play with him.

“But mommy, you haven’t played with me all week,” Timmy whined.

“Didn’t you hear what I just said!? I’m not feeling good!” Evelyn screamed at her son, making him flinch back fearfully. The recently widowed mother sighed, her hair a mess from lack of sleep, lack of nutrition, and alcohol. “Just leave me alone.”

Timmy felt his eyes water and ran to his room before he could cry. In recent times, Evelyn and Timmy both suffered from the same man who brought the family together, a brilliant scientist. Before his fatal accident on the road, Timmy’s father used to play with him and show him his inventions.

Timmy went to his closet and pulled out a box of toys that he hadn’t played in a while. One of the contents Timmy found while rummaging through it was a strange metallic gun, shaped like a typical sci-fi space gun. A sly thought ran across his young mind.

Timmy snuck out of his room, hoping to creep up on his mom and surprised her. Peeking around the corner, Evelyn was sobbing in her hands. Now was the perfect time for the boy to jump out and aim the ray gun at her.

“Reach for the sky!”

Evelyn jumped and turned to her son, aiming the “toy” ray gun at her, which she instantly remembered what it was. “Timmy, put that gun down! That is not a toy—!!”

Suddenly, Timmy squeezes the trigger and a beam of light shot at the late 20’s mother. Evelyn screamed as her body burned, all while she instantly diminished to the size of an inch. Disoriented and slightly dizzy, Evelyn quickly came to and discovered that everything had gotten bigger. Scratch that, she shrunk!

That was her husband’s last invention: the shrinking ray gun!

Suddenly, the ground around Evelyn shook as her now gigantic son approached the living room, his barefeet clapping along the carpet. “Mommy? Where are you? Where did you go?“

One of the young giant’s bare feet raised itself over Evelyn, who gasped and ducked away right before the foot fell. The shrunken mother was stuck between a pair of her young son’s feet and he was initially Jone the wiser of her location. Sure enough, while Evelyn screamed up at her son...

STORY A: Eighteen year old Miles shrinks his Mom to take her as his date to senior prom.

STORY B: Eighteen year old Kevin shrinks his Mom to be his sex toy before he goes to college

STORY C: Eighteen year old Lucas shrinks his Mom after hearing she wants to chaperone his date with his girlfriend Nicole.
125.title: An 18 year old with a doll sized mommy

13.title: Brother shrinks sister

choices: "Matt, I bought you an ice cream." He accidentally shrinks Stephanie.
"Hey, dork. I came to see if you are still crying." He shrinks Hannah.
135.content:
In a dark night. "He's getting away!" A man yells. There was no way out for Dr. Minature, he was escaping from some tough guys that were hired by a disappointed client of his.

"My reputation is ruined, all my inventions and research went down to the toilet." He takes out something from his coat. "You are the last thing I need to get rid of it." He puts it on the ground and it's about to step it, but. "I can't, you are my precious, I just pray that you won't fall in the wrong hands." He hides it and leaves the park.

The next day at the same park .

"Hurry, Matt." A girl calls her older brother. "I want to eat an ice cream."

"Calm down, Steph." Matthew, a 15 year old teenager replies. "Let's keep playing with the frisbee and I'll take you there." He throws it at her and notices his shoelaces were untied.

Stephanie, his 11 year old sister, catches it. "Not fair, if Hannah was here..."

"If Hannah was here, she would tell you that if you hit him with the frisbee, she will buy you two double cones." Hannah, their 17 year old sister appears.

"Wait, what?" Matt turns, only to feel the disc hitting his head. "Fuck! It hurts!"

"Good job, sis." Hannah smirks. "Now let's leave this loser and go get your ice cream."

"Yay!" Stephanie celebrates.

"Fucking bitch." Matt mumbles, resting on the grass. "She is a bad influence to Stephanie." He extends his hand to cover the sun. "I wish there was a way to teach them a lesson." Then, he notices a reflection coming from a nearby bush. He takes a look and finds a metallic gun. "What is this? A toy gun?" He feels curious about this object. "Maybe I can sell it online." He puts in on his pocket and walks home.

An hour later, Matt holds the gun in his room. "I wonder if this thing still has a battery." He points towards his bedroom door. However...

1512331.content:
Andrew was a normal 18 year old boy how lives a rather normal life, he couldn't really ask for more. Maybe a less annoying sister. Andrew had a 12 year old sister who was rather annoying, for Andrew that is and she is always walking into Andrews room to find out what he is doing. Also she tends to bother him at every turn, but she does know to not cross the line, but she is rather smart, like really smart. Though its hidden under all the teenage sass. Andrew is always wonder ho she got that smart but he thinks she is just rather intereasted in learning.

Jessy Andrew's younger sister is rather short but has a nice long blonde hair. Blue ocean like eyes, she is often walks around the house bare foot and a tank top and a skirt. Andrew was in his room as per usual, playing games and watching videos and relaxing. Then he hears footsteps and right then and there he knew right there who it is, he can make no mistake whos footsteps are those.

"What's you doing Andrew?" Jessy asked in a cheery voice.

Andrew replying calmly "Nothing, what brings you here in my room." Jessy giggles at the remark know that he doesn't what her hear.

"Well you see I wanted to see what you are doing, and plus I also want to ask you if your not too busy with it to help me out with something." Andrew looks at Jessy with doubtful eyes, it seems like a prank of some sort Andrew thought to himself.

"Like what homework, getting something?" Andrew questioned.

'Well its something I made and I don't know if it works or not so, I need you to help me test it." Though Andrew knows well that Jessy is always creating things but by the sounds of it, must be some prank because she never real asks him to help her with something so. Though he will keep a pin in it I might be cool, plus Jessy is not all too bad shes only bad when she wants to be.

"I will think about it." Jessy smiles and nods and then walks out, Andrew was quite suprise that Jessy went out that quickly maybe she turned a new leaf or maybe she really is working on something important.

info.brief_description: Family members shrink each other for naughty fun.
info.description:
Someone finds a shrink ray and uses it on one of their family members.

RULES

No Male on Male interaction

No poop or diaper content

No unbirthing

No one sentence chapters.

No characters under 9 years old

Have fun!
